languages.text:
Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both melee and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text:
获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。
只要装备者在同一个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}同时进行了{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击与{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击，则5格内所有体型小于装备者的敌人，都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text:
Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}。
只要装备者在同一个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}同时进行了近战攻击与远程攻击，则5格内所有体型小于装备者的敌人，都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}此效果可叠加。

languages.text:
Дает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}.
Когда персонаж в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} совершает атаки и в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем{/g}, и в {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дальнем бою{/g}, противники, которые по размеру меньше, чем персонаж, в радиусе 5 клеток получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text:
Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Дает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g}.
Когда персонаж в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} совершает атаки и в ближнем, и в {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дальнем{/g} бою, противники, которые по размеру меньше, чем персонаж, в радиусе 5 клеток получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

Дает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g}.
Когда персонаж в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} совершает атаки и в ближнем, и в {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дальнем{/g} бою, противники, которые по размеру меньше, чем персонаж, в радиусе 5 клеток получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が10%増加する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}攻撃と{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃のどちらも行う場合、使用者よりも小さい半径5セル以内の敵全てに、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}のスタックが1付与される。スタックする。
languages.original_text:
Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が10％増加する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で使用者が近接攻撃と{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃のどちらも行う場合、使用者よりも小さい半径5セル以内の敵全てに、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}のスタックが1付与される。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text:
Concede +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.
Si el portador realiza tanto {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} como {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}a distancia{/g} en este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cada enemigo a un radio de 5 casillas que sea más pequeño que el portador sufre +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text:
Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
Concede +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}.
Si el portador realiza tanto ataques cuerpo a cuerpo como a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} en este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cada enemigo a un radio de 5 casillas que sea más pequeño que el portador sufre +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text:
Gewährt +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.
Wenn der Träger sowohl {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}- als auch {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g} in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} ausgeführt hat, erleidet jeder Feind in einem 5-Zellen-Radius, der kleiner als der Träger ist, +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}. Addiert sich.
languages.original_text:
Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. traits.locale_text:
Gewährt +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}.
Wenn der Träger sowohl Nahkampf- als auch {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriffe in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} ausgeführt hat, erleidet jeder Feind in einem 5-Zellen-Radius, der kleiner als der Träger ist, +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}. Addiert sich.

languages.text:
Confère +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur combine les attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} et les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g} au cours du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, tous les ennemis plus petits que lui présents dans un rayon de 5 cases subissent +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. Cumulable.
